airport world map phone book help desk

what is biome?

biome is a web project that focuses on roleplay, creation, and collaboration. it's a world with its own lore, locations, mechanics, and creatures, which are all realized by its contributors.

my goal with biome is to create an ecosystem of materials and artists that work together to populate this world. i want to encourage interactivity and participation.

how do i contribute?

we are taking submissions for the fauna/flora index.
